info.name: BlackTube - Addon
info.description: This is an UNOFFICIAL addon for BlackTube userstyle. It mainly focuses on changes to subscription view and adding partial support for Youtube+ (Youtube Plus). Original BlackTube is required to work.
info.additionalInfo:
18/02/2017 - Top margin fix.
16/02/2017 - Additional fixes for latest YouTube.
03/01/2017 - Additional fixes for latest BlackTube.
21/12/2016 - Fixing few BlackTube bugs for inputs in comment sections and channel preference button.
14/12/2016 - Few more fixes with new YT layout. (margins, few colors here and there)
19/11/2016 - Watched videos are working correctly again.
18/11/2016 - Small fix for YT Kevlar.

data.title: There is a new version of BlackTube
Adds massive popup blocking whole window
